item.title: NeEd HeLp!
item.dc:creator: @owwch_u_died owwch u died
item.description:
@owwch_u_died wrote:

Ok, well i have the appropriate code for anti nullers… its here…
if(UID != yourclientuidhere) {
misc.println("[Client Handler]:"+playerName+" Is trying to connect without your client");
disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.kickNick = null;
PlayerHandler.kickNick = “null”;
}else if(playerName.startsWith(“SYI”) || playerName.equals(null) || playerName.equals(“null”)){PlayerHandler.kickNick = playerName;
appendToBanned(playerName);
disconnected = true;
misc.println(playerName+" Banned");
PlayerHandler.kickNick = null;
PlayerHandler.kickNick = “null”;
}

But when i compile it, it says CANNOT FIND SYMBOL ON CLIENTUIDHERE Help and i put it in client.java hope its right. Need help!

Read full topic
